item.title: 预期疲软加剧投资者担忧，Arm 股价暴跌
item.description: 受全球贸易紧张局势影响，芯片技术供应商 Arm Holdings 公布了疲软的季度营收和利润预期，成为半导体行业中最新一家公布这一预期的公司，该公司股价在周四的盘前交易中下挫超过 10%。【原文：Arm Holdings shares sank more than 10% in premarket trade on Thursday after the chip tech provider became the latest in the semiconductor industry to provide a weak quarterly revenue and profit forecast due to global trade tensions.】

item.title: 美国关税不确定性影响英飞凌收入前景
item.description: 德国芯片制造商英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies）周四报告了稳定的订单量，但由于全球关税争端的不确定性，该公司下调了全年收入展望。【原文：German chipmaker Infineon Technologies reported stable order intake on Thursday but lowered its full-year revenue outlook due to uncertainty over global tariff disputes.】

item.title: Prosus 预计全年电子商务利润将超过 4 亿美元的指导目标
item.description: 荷兰技术投资者 Prosus NV 首席执行官 Fabricio Bloisi 周四表示，预计本财年其电子商务业务的调整后利润将超过预期，达到 4.35 亿美元。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus NV expects adjusted profit at its e-commerce business to exceed its guidance and reach $435 million this fiscal year, Chief Executive Fabricio Bloisi said on Thursday.】

item.title: 台湾 4 月出口在美国加征关税前猛增 30%，上半年表现强劲
item.description: 台湾 4 月份出口增幅超过预期，原因是客户在美国任何关税生效前囤积了台湾的高科技产品，这可能推动上半年出口创下新高。【原文：Taiwan's exports rose more than expected in April as customers stockpiled the island's high-tech products before any U.S. tariffs take effect, which could drive first-half exports to a new high.】

item.title: 欧洲央行经济学家称外籍劳工是欧元区经济增长的主要动力
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的一项研究周四得出结论说，自大流行病以来，外籍工人在欧元区经济增长中占了很大比重，他们可以帮助欧元区克服劳动力市场老龄化和萎缩所带来的经济制约。【原文：Foreign workers accounted for much of the euro zone's economic growth since the pandemic and could help the bloc overcome the economic constraints of an ageing and shrinking labour market, a European Central Bank study concluded on Thursday.】

item.title: 受关税影响，美国集装箱进口连增近乎创纪录的势头预计将在5月戛然而止
item.description: 美国集装箱进口量在四月份激增，因为各公司竞相规避唐纳德-特朗普总统征收的关税，其中包括对来自中国的商品征收 145% 的关税，但美国两个最繁忙港口的高管们表示，这一趋势在五月份有望逆转。【原文：U.S. container imports surged in April as companies raced to avoid President Donald Trump's tariffs, which now include a 145% duty on goods from China, but executives at the country's two busiest ports said the trend looked set to reverse in May.】

item.title: 中国华为将推出首款搭载自主研发的 "和谐 "操作系统的笔记本电脑
item.description: 中国华为公司周四在社交媒体上发布消息称，该公司将于 5 月 19 日推出首款搭载自主研发的 Harmony 操作系统的笔记本电脑。【原文：China's Huawei will launch its first laptop with the self-developed Harmony operating system on May 19, the company said in a social media post on Thursday.】

item.title: 据 CNBC-TV18 报道，印度同意有条件批准 "星链 "在该国运营
item.description: 据CNBC-TV18电视新闻频道周四报道，印度政府已同意有条件批准SpaceX公司的Starlink开始在该国提供基于卫星的互联网服务。【原文：The Indian government has agreed to a conditional nod for SpaceX's Starlink to start offering satellite-based internet services in the country, television news channel CNBC-TV18 reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 博世 2025 年有机销售额增长 1%-3%，受市场疲软影响有所放缓
item.description: 德国汽车供应商罗伯特-博世 [RIC:RIC:ROBG.UL]周四表示，预计2025年销售额将按汇率调整后增长1%至3%。【原文：German automotive supplier Robert Bosch [RIC:RIC:ROBG.UL] said on Thursday it expects 2025 sales to grow a currency-adjusted 1% to 3%.】

item.title: 台湾华航订购 14 架波音 777X 飞机
item.description: 波音公司周四表示，台湾中华航空公司订购了 14 架波音 777X 宽体飞机。【原文：Boeing said on Thursday that Taiwan's China Airlines placed an order for 14 Boeing 777X wide-body planes.】

item.title: 中国百度寻求为人工智能系统破解动物叫声申请专利
item.description: 有没有想过能听懂猫咪想告诉你什么？一家中国科技公司正在探索是否有可能利用人工智能将这些神秘的喵喵声翻译成人类语言。【原文：Ever wished you could understand what your cat is trying to tell you? A Chinese tech company is exploring whether it's possible to translate those mysterious meows into human language using artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 预计美英两国将于周四宣布关税协议
item.description: 预计美国和英国将于周四宣布一项降低部分商品关税的协议，这是自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对世界各国征收关税以来达成的首个此类协议。【原文：The United States and Britain are expected to announce a deal to lower tariffs on some goods on Thursday, the first such agreement since U.S. President Donald Trump imposed levies on countries around the world.】

item.title: 特朗普发出 "重大 "贸易协议信号，欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，在全球关税争端中达成第一份贸易协议方面取得了进展，提振了市场情绪，欧洲股市周四攀升。【原文：European shares climbed on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump signalled progress toward a first trade deal in his global tariff dispute, boosting market sentiment.】

item.title: 英镑变化不大，因美国贸易协议受到追捧，英国央行降息受到关注
item.description: 英镑周四持稳，此前有报道称美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将宣布美英之间的贸易协议，而市场焦点则转向当天晚些时候英国央行的降息预期。【原文：The British pound was steady on Thursday after a report said that U.S. President Donald Trump was set to announce a trade deal between the U.S. and Britain, with the market's focus turning to an expected rate cut from the Bank of England later in the day.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Axelspace 计划于 6 月上市，这是日本最新一家寻求上市的太空初创公司
item.description: 两位消息人士称，总部位于东京的卫星制造商Axelspace计划最早于6月上市，在投资者对该行业前景看法不一的情况下，日本资本市场上不断有国内太空初创企业上市，Axelspace是其中最新的一家。【原文：Tokyo-based satellite maker Axelspace plans to list its shares as early as June, two sources said, the latest in a steady stream of domestic space startups tapping the Japanese capital markets amid mixed investor views on the sector's prospects.】

item.title: 马来西亚 Capital A 公司股东批准最多减资 14 亿美元
item.description: 拥有亚航的马来西亚 Capital A 公司周四表示，其股东和债务人批准了一项高达 60 亿林吉特（约合 14 亿美元）的减资计划，该公司的目标是摆脱 "财务困境 "的标签。【原文：Malaysia's Capital A , which owns airline AirAsia, said on Thursday its shareholders and debtholders approved a capital reduction plan of up to 6 billion ringgit ($1.4 billion), as the company aims to shrug off its 'financially distressed' tag.】

item.title: 贸易战将削减中国钢铁出口，加剧国内供过于求的局面
item.description: 分析师和贸易商表示，由于贸易战和随之而来的保护主义浪潮压制了出口市场，中国第二季度的钢铁出口将出现下滑，有可能加剧国内的供应过剩。【原文：China's steel exports are set to slump in the second quarter, threatening to exacerbate a supply glut at home, analysts and traders said, as the trade war and a wave of protectionism moving in its wake crimps export markets.】

item.title: 任天堂年度利润增长 13%，Switch 2 销量达 1,500 万台
item.description: 任天堂周四预计，在截至 3 月的一年中，营业利润将增长 13%，达到 3200 亿日元（22.2 亿美元）。【原文：Nintendo on Thursday forecast operating profit would rise 13% to 320 billion yen ($2.22 billion) in the year ending March.】

item.title: 全球资金寻找美国替代品，澳大利亚股市大放异彩
item.description: 外国投资者纷纷转向澳大利亚的国内股票，选择这个经常被忽视的市场作为贸易战的藏身之地，因为这里有廉价的货币和有弹性的经济。【原文：Foreign investors have been turning to Australia's domestically focused stocks, choosing an often overlooked market as a trade-war hideout with a cheap currency and resilient economy.】

item.title: 航运集团马士基下调 2025 年全球集装箱市场预测
item.description: 由于经济和地缘政治的不确定性增加，航运集团 A.P. 穆勒-马士基（A.P. Moller-Maersk）周四下调了对今年全球集装箱市场的预期，但其利润前景保持不变。【原文：Shipping group A.P. Moller-Maersk on Thursday lowered its global container market forecast for this year due to increased economic and geopolitical uncertainty, although it left its profit outlook unchanged.】

item.title: 洲际酒店一反行业趋势，重申年度利润预期
item.description: 假日酒店集团（Holiday Inn）的所有者洲际酒店集团（InterContinental Hotels Group，IHG）周四表示，该集团有望实现全年一致预期的利润，无视业内同行对美国经济和消费者情绪减弱的预测警告。【原文：Holiday Inn owner InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG) said on Thursday it is on track to meet the full-year consensus profit estimate, defying industry peers' forecast warnings over waning economic and consumer sentiment in the U.S.】

item.title: 旅游需求强劲，阿联酋航空年度利润创历史新高
item.description: 迪拜阿联酋航空公司周四公布，受主要航线强劲的国际旅游需求推动，全年利润创下历史新高。【原文：Dubai's Emirates airline on Thursday reported a record full-year profit, boosted by strong international travel demand on major routes.】

item.title: 彪马报告第一季度利润率下降
item.description: 体育用品品牌彪马周四报告称，第一季度利润率下降，第一季度销售额持平，公司正在削减成本，试图扭转业绩。【原文：Sportswear brand Puma reported a decline in first-quarter profit margin on Thursday and flat first-quarter sales as the company cuts costs in an attempt to turn its performance around.】

item.title: 德国 3 月出口月率增长 1.1
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周四公布的数据显示，德国 3 月份出口同比增长 1.1%。【原文：German exports rose by 1.1% in March compared with the previous month, data from the federal statistics office showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 康斯伯格第一季度利润因国防系统需求而飙升
item.description: 挪威防务设备制造商康斯伯格集团（Kongsberg Gruppen）周四公布，受导弹和防空系统等需求的推动，第一季度核心利润增长了81%。【原文：Norwegian defence equipment maker Kongsberg Gruppen reported an 81% higher first-quarter core profit on Thursday, driven by demand for its missiles and air defence systems among others.】

item.title: 啤酒酿造商百威英博公布第一季度利润超过预期两倍
item.description: 安海斯-布希英博（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周四公布第一季度营业利润增长 7.9%，远高于分析师预计的 3.1%。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev on Thursday reported a 7.9% rise in first-quarter operating profit, well ahead of analyst estimates for 3.1% growth.】

item.title: Tripledot 以 8 亿美元收购 AppLovin 的移动游戏组合
item.description: 移动游戏开发商 Tripledot Studios 周四表示，已同意以约 8 亿美元的现金和股票收购营销平台 AppLovin 的移动游戏工作室组合。【原文：Mobile game developer Tripledot Studios said on Thursday it has agreed to buy marketing platform AppLovin's mobile games studio portfolio for about $800 million in cash and stock.】

item.title: 受关税影响，丰田全年利润下降 21
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税压力和日元升值使强劲的混合动力需求失去了一些光彩，丰田汽车公司周四预测本财年利润将下降21%。【原文：Toyota Motor forecast a 21% profit decline for the current financial year on Thursday, as the strain from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and an appreciating yen take some of the shine off strong hybrid demand.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 正在洽谈聘请高级管理人员担任主要领导职务的事宜
item.description: 据《The Information》周四援引熟悉该计划的人士的话报道，OpenAI 正在与一名高级技术主管进行谈判，以便在这家人工智能公司的一次重大领导层重组中监管公司的一些部门。【原文：OpenAI is in talks with a senior technology executive to oversee some of the company's divisions in a major leadership restructuring at the artificial intelligence firm, The Information reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：PIMCO 认为美国经济衰退风险加剧
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 表示，美国经济衰退的风险达到了多年来的最高点，投资者错误地判断了唐纳德-特朗普总统征收高额关税的决心。【原文：U.S. bond giant PIMCO said recession risks in the country are at their highest in years and that investors are misjudging President Donald Trump's resolve to enforce steep tariffs.】
